author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Wojas Q1 Net Loss Widens To 1.8 Mln Zlotys
text:
May 30 (Reuters) - WOJAS SA:
* REPORTED ON TUESDAY Q1 NET LOSS OF 1.8 MILLION ZLOTYS VERSUS LOSS OF 1.6 MILLION ZLOTYS YEAR AGO
* Q1 REVENUE 46.9 MILLION ZLOTYS VERSUS 47.5 MILLION ZLOTYS YEAR AGO
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
